name: Hungry Chef
description:
*** REDUCED PRICE - GET IT OR GIFT IT QUICK! ***

18/12/2010: Selected as 'New & Noteworthy' by Apple!

Help Alfredo the Chef eat as many goodies as possible!

Dodge the frogs, pigs and chickens and devour as many delicious goodies as you can eat to score points.

Featuring
- Superb graphics and animations
- Increased difficulty with game progression
- Professional sound effects and background music
